translated: But I say that what is known by oneself, seen by oneself, realized by oneself, is to be asserted.ğŸ”½Monks, I have seen beings who, due to possessing bodily good conduct, verbal good conduct, & mental good conduct; who, not reviling the noble ones, right in their views, taking the right view, taking on the right view, will, in regard to skillful activities, experience results that are agreeable, not disagreeable.ğŸ”½But I have seen beings who, due to possessing bodily misconduct, verbal misconduct, & mental misconduct; who, reviling the noble ones, wrong in their views, taking the wrong view, taking on the wrong view, will, in regard to unskillful activities, experience results that are disagreeable, not agreeable.

translated: Monks, I have seen beings who, due to possessing bodily misconduct, verbal misconduct, & mental misconduct; who, reviling the noble ones, wrong in their views, taking the wrong view, taking on the wrong view, on the break-up of the body, after death, have re-appeared in a plane of deprivation, a bad destination, a lower realm, hell.
The Blessed One said this.
And in this regard it was said:
â€œHaving directed the mind wrongly,
and having spoken wrongly,
having done wrong actions,
a person here in the world,
having little learning, having done little merit,
having little of this life remaining,
on the break-up of the body, after death, the witless one
is reborn in hell.â€
